Featured User

Maria Chen, Product Marketing Manager

Maria leveraged SAP Analytics Cloud to reduce her team's reporting time by 60%. By integrating AI-powered insights into her competitive analysis workflow, she transformed how her PMM team approaches market intelligence. "The combination of real-time data and predictive analytics has completely changed our go-to-market planning," she says. Her dashboard templates are now being adopted across the global PMM organization.
